2085650.name: LAVALAMP Soundtrack
2085650.description:
A weird and cozy time with ambiant and dreamy music from the game LAVALAMP.

LAVALAMP is a free game. If you want to help us, this OST is a way to do so!

All the music has been composed and produced by the game creator, Gabriel Ledoux, in his bedroom. Inspired by electronic music, movie-like strings sounds and music from ending credits of Saturday-morning cartoons, this soundscape will send you in a familiar but strange after-noon.
developers: The Space Lemmings from Space Productions
publishers: The Space Lemmings from Space Productions
